what: Get a data frame of CSV specifications — get_csv_specs
title: Get a data frame of CSV specifications — get_csv_specs
text: function return data frame numerous specifications every CSV file passed files argument.

title: Get a data frame of CSV specifications — get_csv_specs
Get a data frame of CSV specifications — get_csv_specs
text: files character vector containing absolute relative paths portfolio CSVs, directory containing portfolio CSVs expected_colnames character vector containing names columns expected portfolio CSVs

title: Get a data frame of CSV specifications — get_csv_specs
text: data frame (invisibly) containing one row per portfolio CSV columns identified specification

what:
Guess the delimiter of a delimited file for a vector of filenames or
filepaths — guess_delimiter
title:
Guess the delimiter of a delimited file for a vector of filenames or
filepaths — guess_delimiter
text: function guess delimiter delimited file vector filenames filepaths return delimiter string. defaults following delimiters order others valid: ",", ";", tab, "|", ":". file inaccessible binary, return NA element.  pass anything character vector single column data.frame filepaths argument, function give error.

title:
Guess the delimiter of a delimited file for a vector of filenames or
filepaths — guess_delimiter

Guess the delimiter of a delimited file for a vector of filenames or
filepaths — guess_delimiter
text: filepaths character vector

title:
Guess the delimiter of a delimited file for a vector of filenames or
filepaths — guess_delimiter
text: character vector length filepaths.

what: Guess the file encoding for a vector of filenames or filepaths — guess_file_encoding
title: Guess the file encoding for a vector of filenames or filepaths — guess_file_encoding
text: function guess file encoding vector filenames filepaths return file encoding string. primarily uses stringi::stri_enc_detect() guess encoding. Additionally, searches known CP850 CP1252 characters return appropriate encoding found, ICU/stringi detect . file binary file, return "binary". file inaccessible return NA element.

title: Guess the file encoding for a vector of filenames or filepaths — guess_file_encoding
Guess the file encoding for a vector of filenames or filepaths — guess_file_encoding
text: filepaths character vector threshold single element numeric (minimum confidence level guess [0-1])

title: Guess the file encoding for a vector of filenames or filepaths — guess_file_encoding
text: character vector length filepaths.

what: Guess if a file is a text file for a vector of filenames or filepaths — is_text_file
title: Guess if a file is a text file for a vector of filenames or filepaths — is_text_file
text: function guess file text file vector filenames filepaths return TRUE FALSE . guesses file text find nul bytes first 2048 bytes file. imperfect guess, likely binary/non-text file nul byte near beginning file. might guess file intended read text text file, least likely able read file text without error. file inaccessible, either empty, permission read , directory, exist, function return FALSE. pass anything character vector single column data.frame filepaths argument, function give error.

title: Guess if a file is a text file for a vector of filenames or filepaths — is_text_file
Guess if a file is a text file for a vector of filenames or filepaths — is_text_file
text: filepaths character vector

title: Guess if a file is a text file for a vector of filenames or filepaths — is_text_file
text: logical vector length filepaths.

what: Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
title: Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
text: function validates vector ISINs valid codes conform ISO 6166 specification TRUE FALSE. checks basic structure (2 alpha characters, 9 alpha-numeric characters, 1 check digit) also validates check digit using Luhn algorithm.

Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
text: isins character vector

title: Validate a vector of ISINs — is_valid_isin
text: logical vector length isins.

what: Read in portfolio CSV/s, working around a number of non-standard issues — read_portfolio_csv
title: Read in portfolio CSV/s, working around a number of non-standard issues — read_portfolio_csv
text: function read one portfolio CSVs. works around number common issues, like alternate column names, alternate delimiter, alternate decimal grouping marks, file encodings besides ASCII UTF-8, etc.

title: Read in portfolio CSV/s, working around a number of non-standard issues — read_portfolio_csv
Read in portfolio CSV/s, working around a number of non-standard issues — read_portfolio_csv
text: filepaths character vector single column data frame (strings valid file paths CSV files directory contains CSV files) combine single element logical (default TRUE)

title: Read in portfolio CSV/s, working around a number of non-standard issues — read_portfolio_csv
text: combine TRUE, returns tbl_df readable data portfolio CSVs combined. combine FALSE, returns list tbl_dfs, one readable portfolio CSV.
